Name: CHUCHEL
About the game: CHUCHEL is a comedy adventure game from the creators of Machinarium, Botanicula and Samorost. Join the hairy hero Chuchel and his rival Kekel as they will be facing numerous puzzles and challenges in their quest to retrieve the precious cherry! The reward? Cheerful situational humor, wild music and sounds by the band DVA and dozens of hilarious gags that warm up even the coldest of souls. Plus cherries! Be ready to: Crack up. Many times Guide Chuchel through a set of original puzzles Enjoy hundreds of whimsical animations Beat stages inspired by classic video games Interact with dozens of funky characters Please your ears with soundtrack by the IGF Award-winning band DVA Build an inexplicable passion for cherries Laugh. A lot.
